name: Dyox
description:
Dyox is a homebrew PSP game built in 2006. Inspired by the classic game Oxyd, Dyox is a 2D puzzle game where you control a marble and interact with level objects to gain access to each level's goal.

A development diary written when the game was released is available: http://brightnightgames.com/games.php?game=dyox&sec=development
